attributes.action: introduce road pricing based on speed limits and vehicle speeds so that exceeding limits incurs automatic costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Base road pricing on location and speed limit relative to vehicle speed. Exceeding limit would incur automatic penalty, increasing in proportion to excess. Sweeten pill by increasing motorway limit to 80mph. No more speed cameras but all speeding would cost.
